title: UK's Johnson to offer India alternatives to Russia ties on visit - Economic Times
content:
1. UK's Johnson to offer India alternatives to Russia ties on visit  Economic Times
  2. Boris Johnson to hear India’s stand on Ukraine conflict, not lecture Delhi  Hindustan Times
  3. Exclusive Details Of Boris Johnson's Visit To India Accessed, Gujarat CM To Receive UK PM | Watch  Republic World
  4. India, UK must look beyond roadmaps, deal announcements. Boris Johnson’s visit an opportunity  ThePrint
  5. India-UK partnership is like the Modi-Johnson relationship. Underrated in geopolitics  ThePrint
  6. View Full coverage on Google News
description: In the wake of Russia's invasion of Ukraine, Western allies have called for India to speak out against the war. India, which is the world's biggest buyer of Russia's weapons and imports its oil, abstained in a United Nations vote condemning the invasion and has not imposed sanctions on Moscow.
